title: Aditi's power packed soya vegetable soup
ingredients: ['110g dried mini soya chunks', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 tablespoon ginger garlic paste', '90g broccoli florets', '2 medium tomatoes', '130g diced carrots', '90g grated cabbage', '700ml water', '1/2 teaspoon Sriracha sauce', 'salt, to taste', 'chopped fresh coriander']
